about.title: about me
about.paragraph1: I am a <1>frontend developer</1> with experience in creating modern websites, integrating with backends, and working with non-relational databases. I enjoy exploring <1>backend development, mobile</1>, and cloud solutions. I study <1>Software Engineering</1> at UniFil and always strive to improve my skills.
about.paragraph2: I like to combine <1>technology</1> and <1>creativity</1> to build efficient solutions that solve everyday problems. I believe in the importance of <1>continuous learning</1> and collaborating with teams to deliver <1>quality products</1>.

qualification.title: qualification
qualification.subtitle: My education and work experience so far

responsibilities.title: Responsabilities
tasks: Full-stack development of the e-commerce platform using Next.js, React.js, and Node.js
Developed an inventory management system for efficient control of products, customers, and orders
Implemented Stripe payment API for secure checkout
Direct collaboration with stakeholders to gather requirements and ensure the platform aligns with the business model

responsibilities.title: Responsabilities
tasks: Implemented an informational tab for disease consultation, serving as a 'disease handbook'
Developed an interactive chatbot for pre-diagnosis suggestions based on user-provided symptoms
Integrated an interactive map displaying nearby medical care facilities based on the user's location

portfolio.title: portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Completed projects and details about each system

modal.title: Poop Party
modal.description: Project inspired by a game among friends to count how many times we went to the bathroom throughout an entire year. Initially, we used a WhatsApp group, but I decided to automate this process while learning NestJS in practice.
details: Backend: NestJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT Authentication
Other Technologies: ViteJS, Firebase, Zod, Deployed on Vercel

modal.title: Junior Baby E-commerce
modal.description: Project developed during my mandatory internship, where I created an e-commerce from scratch with Stripe payment, integrated with an inventory management system for administrators.
details: Frontend: React, TypeScript, NextJS, Tailwind, ShadcnUI
Backend: NodeJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, JWT Authentication
Other Technologies: Firebase, Stripe, React Redux, Zod

modal.title: Saúde in Foco
modal.description: Curricular extension project aimed at democratizing access to health information for Londrina residents. It includes health news, an AI-based pre-diagnosis chatbot, an interactive map showing nearby medical care points, and a disease guide with information on symptoms and treatments.

modal.title: Portfolio
modal.description: My personal portfolio to showcase my projects, knowledge, and professional journey to recruiters and other interested parties.

modal.title: AI VideoHelper
modal.description: A tool that automates the creation of YouTube video descriptions and titles based on the transcription of the uploaded video content.
details: Frontend: React, NextJS, Tailwind, SwiperJS, ShadcnUI
Backend: Prisma, Fastify, Node.js, AI, Zod
